channel.title: Posts on Mathieu @ ULaval
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Mathieu @ ULaval

item.title: GRAAL
item.description: I’m glad to be a part of the GRAAL research group for this summer. The group is led by François Laviolette and Mario Marchand and their interests are mainly machine learning theory and its applications. This will be my first experience in machine learning, but it should be fun!

item.title: GIREF
item.description: This summer I will join the GIREF research group under the supervision of José Urquiza. Their main focus are numerical methods such as the widely used finite element method.

item.title: RAMiCS 2017
item.description: I’m happy to announce that my submitted paper with Jules Desharnais titled “Relation as Images” has been accepted at RAMiCS 2017. So I’ll be in Lyon in early May to present our recent work.

item.title: LSFM
item.description: I’m thrilled to join the LSFM research group for this summer under the supervision of Jules Desharnais. Their interests lies in languages, semantics, formal and algebraic methods. I couldn’t ask for a better first research experience!
